description: This deliciously sweet jelly dessert has festive flavours with the cinnamon cream on top.
name: Grape Jelly Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Heat up a saucepan to a medium heat and add the lime juice and grapes and sugar and cook for 5 minutes.
Mash the grapes with a potato masher and cook for 10 minutes while stirring.
Soak the gelatine in water for 10 minutes.
Remove the grapes from the heat and sieve the ingredients over a bowl to collect the juice. Get as much juice from the mixture as possible.
Now remove the gelatine from the water and place in the grape juice with the muscat wine and combine fully.
Pour the jelly mixture into 4 serving glasses and leave to set in the fridge overnight.
The next day, serve with jelly with whipped cream on top and sprinkle with cinnamon sugar to serve.
